lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. We have quite a quickly ramping episode tonight, but before we get to that, let's go ahead and talk about a few of our awesome announcements and sponsors. First up, tonight's episode is sponsored by our good friends, as always, at Loot Crate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, you have a few words on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys! I've got some talking points here. Go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole and enter promo code CriticalRole for ten percent off your subscription, or lootcrate.com/VivaThordak. Enter promo code "Sam reads these ahead of time. Just kidding, that doesn't exist, but that's what "happens when I don't read the notes ahead of time." That was very funny, crew! Very funny! The crew got me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that was actually supplied by Loot Crate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can confirm that that is indeed--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's amazing! They got me! Well, that's fine. Well, I had prepared something, should I do it anyway? All right, I need a little slow snap from everybody, because this is a beat poem. Here it is: Hey daddy-o, you get hip to some knowledge, it's up from the school of hard knocks, not some stuck up college, I know the Man's gonna try to shut me down, lock me up, send me off to Vietnam, but I've got to speak the truth, little hepcats and kittens, because that's who I am. See right here is a box of things that corporate America wants you to buy, wants you to toe the party line! Cut your hair, shave your goatee, and subscribe! But me and the Ginchee guys down at Vitamin Village say no, you dig? No to the fat cats, the stick suits, and the company pigs! We're dragging our cigs and take a swig of moonshine. Dump this crate on the floor and look at this so-called-- actually, it's really cool stuff; it's some really awesome stuff-- Doctor Strange! That cat is swell! Fantastic Beasts looks crazy as hell! The box can fold out too, and that's jazzy! Ignore what I said before, I was just spazzing! So yeah! Loot Crate, steal my soul, give me a discount, using CriticalRole! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was ridiculous! Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the bee's knees, daddy-o! Oh snap! Hot damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And they trolled me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beat poetry-ed us to our death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Setting up here for the next bout of announcements. First off, thank you to all those who tuned in to our first episode of Talks Machina earlier this week. It's our first episode, and as first episodes are usually fraught with much peril, difficulty-- technical and mental. We hit our stride about halfway through, I felt and I hope you guys enjoyed it. Those will be up Thursday at 7:00. We'll have a few cast members come in and talk to our fantastic host Brian Foster, he is fantastic, show him some support.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was so much fun, getting to talk about all the shit we never actually get to talk about with other people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, me and Marisha had opportunities every now and then on certain Periscopes to kind of chat a little bit in post-game conversations, really cool to have a space to do that. That's the thing, too, guys, please send in your questions. They're extremely helpful, and I like the idea that we can have some great thoughts without just reading from a chat room that's scrolling at a thousand miles per hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: #AskTalksMachina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. #AskTalksMachina. Thank you very much! Laura, do you want to talk about some of the things that we have in the store?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is so exciting! All right, so these fabulous bracelets and those pins that you guys ordered a while ago? Those are shipping out next week, you guys, so look forward to that! You remember the limited edition patches that we had from Comic Con? We got more of those! So those are back in the store tonight, as well as if you go there right now, you may notice we have a limited run of more Gilmore's Glorious Goods t-shirts, as well as some How Do You Want To Do This t-shirts, and I know those are probably going to sell out pretty fast, but they will be back in the store in a couple of weeks, so if you order now, you might get them before Christmas in a couple weeks. I don't know, but we're doing our best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to get that unicorn, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That unicorn, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a great shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my favorite shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I spot them every now and then in the wild and it's one of the weirdest experiences of my whole life. "Should I say something? I don't know, I feel like I should."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just go (inarticulate noise)--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And these ones, these ones are in stock, so they're not pre-order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also! We have a new round of playlists that have begun. We did the character playlists last year that seemed to go over pretty well. The first one went up last week with Vax's playlist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hilarious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You had a song for me, I saw it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a knee-slapper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's me. That's me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it really funny, or is it (singing) All around me are familiar faces. I'll put that one in for you on my playlist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was an awesome playlist, give you even further insight as to the growth of Vax's character over this past year. We have the next one coming up-- is it yours, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's mine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we have Keyleth's coming up next. Hell yeah. We'll be seeing that on the Geek and Sundry website, so keep an eye out for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell you what, if I have a super-funny year, I'll make a super-funny playlist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will not be having an episode next week, because we're all going to probably be with our families and out of town and eating a lot of food and enjoying the tryptophan. Hope you are doing the same. We'll miss you guys next week but we'll be back the week after at the beginning of December for the rest of this absolute basket of chaos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll be good. It'll be at a restart, when we all die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It'll give you two weeks to build your characters, great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanksgiving, we can be thanksful. We can be thanksful for the campaign we hads, the characters we hads, it'll be greats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plurals all around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You managed to, upon asking one named Whaska, got the information and sent you to Juuraiel, a gambler and very well-off fire giant, one of the few responsible for selling the rest of their people into slavery here within the City of Brass, in which a card game was not won.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was this close!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This close every single time!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was kind of absurd. However, you were given the option, as opposed to now having sold yourselves into slavery to the giant, to instead do this grand favor for them. Apparently, the past lover of this giant was killed in the streets by a pit fiend named Ghurrix who occasionally wanders the slave district called the Arches here in the City of Brass. You agreed to go find and kill this pit fiend out of vengeance for the giant and as such you would be freed from your current onus and be given the armor that is in the possession of Juuraiel, this giant, as well, so everything should be great. You guys applied a Seeming enchantment across the party, allowing most of you to look kind of like copies of Vex and Vax, the sexy sextuplets, as you put it. The kind of things you'd want to purchase. Made your way to the slave market called the Arches, with Scanlan Shorthalt disguised as a flame-wreathed azer, a Fire Plane dwarf. You proceeded to try and sell this party to the pit fiend, Ghurrix, as he walked through the area. After acquiring and purchasing two celestial-blooded boys who were on another slavery block.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Altar boys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it was resisted by the creature, who then, as an instinctive reaction, summoned a friend known as an erinyes from the Nine Hells to join Ghurrix at his side. And that is where we left off. We're going to bring up some boss music here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Props to that set, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This set is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing as how we're in the Fire Elemental Plane, I think it's important that we have some proper Fire Elemental Plane lighting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ghurrix, would you like to phone a friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you like to phone a friend? That's not going to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the blue thing is the magical door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here we have Vex and Trinket, who you had popped out, as well as Vax, who had just stepped out of the portal. Scanlan, with in front of you, the two boys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In front of him?! They were in front of him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were sending them off to be sold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I thought you were holding out the chain and they were standing behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I was holding the chain and they stepped forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog was off here to the side. Here we have Ghurrix himself as well as his ally companion and a number of other slavers and/or slaves that currently line the streets as part of this, who are now watching as this conflict may seem to erupt here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Narrator slash Dungeon Master? What are those guards? There's guards in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I looked for them the last game, and they're not around right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are efreet. You didn't see any around at the moment, no. And they are called the Illuminated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does his companion have a name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You can certainly ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what's behind the pit fiend where the map disappears? Is there building there or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an edge to a building there and part of a thoroughfare walkway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many stories is the building behind them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say probably two stories.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that building made of sharp spikes that if we destroyed the building it would kill the bad guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not. However, I would like to ask you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot going on this roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, natural 20! I don't know what to do with that in this situation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so looking at how things stand here, currently, 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled for Pike, too. Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What's Pike's roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to kill me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also 19. Yeah, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know what? That'll give her more time to get into the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, so Grog and Vax 19. Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not good for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan, what did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be dead by the time I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fully armored, now looking intently as to what her next target is going to be. Vex, you are at the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the top. 24!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jesus. Oh my god. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Number one, I'm going to yell at the boys to run back into the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (nervous laughter) I hadn't thought this much yet because I didn't know I was going to be first. I'm going to-- Homina, homina. I'm going to Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pit fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ghorrix?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ghurrix.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I have a question. If I do the Bramble Shot, does it do the damage straight up, and then if they do the strength save then it doesn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You still have to roll to hit, but then when it hits, it does the damage, and then the strength save is to see if it's restrained or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to tell Trinket to move up next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Trinket rushes through. Trinket comes charging upward. (roars)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and can I do Bramble Shot as one of my attacks and then do another regular attack? Is that the way it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's it say for the specific ability?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just says Bramble Shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, one of your attacks would be a Bramble Shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to do the Bramble Shot on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that doesn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's your dice jail?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. The dice jail was in the thing; it's not here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bramble Shot goes wide, swooping past it and slamming into the building behind it. You watch as the arrow explodes and a series of vines tangle outward and wrap around the side of the building.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. This is off to a really awesome start.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, captain, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just try to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. 14, 16, 17, 18, plus 2d6 because Trinket's standing next to him. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 damage. All right. You already used your bonus action to Hunter's Mark, so he cannot. All right. Do you wish to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I want to back up into the alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hide behind that building right there? In that little crevice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can go ahead and dive into that little alcove there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you just slightly in there. And there you are. You're not quite hidden but you're peeking around the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many feet away am I from them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Ghurrix?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, from Trinket you are roughly 40. A little over 40 feet away. All right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. That's your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My shitty turn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was great. You killed him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's his friend that he summoned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right next to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The little winged thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a parrot on a pirate's shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and this guy over here, who's like (growls). Is he angry at us, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's currently standing next to this block with a slave that's in chains that it's holding the chain to and was in the middle of barking before all of a sudden it watched this summoning happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so he's just like "Fight!" Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking over right now and watching curiously about what's going down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the pit fiend considered huge or large?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Large.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And in charge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm shaking. Okay. I'm going to cast Watery Sphere right on their faces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just get them all wet. Go (blubs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watery Sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They both have to make strength saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or else they're wet? What happens?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or else they are restrained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, in water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the save they have to make?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them have to make a strength saving throw. All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so nervous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21 for the pit fiend. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, so it succeeds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was strength, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The erinyes makes an eight. She does not succeed. While the sphere seems to splatter and try and encompass the pit fiend, it is unaffected by the torrent of water. However, the winged erinyes, who's floating in the air, seems to be pulled into it and is now thrashing about within the water itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I now move it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You conjure the sphere--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says as an action I can move the sphere up to 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what I can see right here, no. You create the sphere and they are restrained, and then future turns, as an action, you can move it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's restrained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got some bonus shit to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not right now. I'm going to wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got some bonus shit to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yo, you got some bonus shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, some bonus shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On my good days, I always have bonus shit to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn? Are you going to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I hug around the corner a little? Hide a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. I don't want to like lose too much visual. Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that end your turn? All right, that brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're tied?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're both tied. You and Grog are both at the same initiative level, so you both go at the same time, but it's up to you who goes first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the big man go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to light this candle and get the party started! I would like to fiery rage. And can I bust out in a straight sprint towards the pit fiend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And in the immortal words of Bob Ross, "Everybody needs a friend," and I want to give him a big fucking bear hug. And I would like to try and grapple him, if I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. We can totally do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can grapple a creature one size larger than myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get these fuckers locked down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DND Bob Ross reference is like Playstation trophies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's how it's supposed to be, man. Just saying. Your grapple can replace an attack, as we said before. So go ahead and make a strength athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have advantage on these because I'm raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Moving up, you have him currently grappled.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're both grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's all leave except for Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That replaces an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently have him grappled with your arm right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll tell your story, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I revisit the days of the Crucible and can I try and suplex this motherfucker onto his side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, sure. Why not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to! Just to get him prone, also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That wouldn't function. You have him grappled. Go ahead and make another athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it girl. Get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 17 plus eight. So that is a 25, so no. As you attempt to lift, these giant devil claws jam into the side of your shoulders. And as the pain hits, it forces you down, and you can't get enough lift. His wings are just too big. He's too dense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm still giving him love, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still holding onto him. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Grog's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are. Well, you're right next to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Directly behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back that way? We'll say for the purposes of this, you're back behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so how far up did you fly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody give me an eight. Where's an eight? 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38, gotcha. All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, then I'm going to fly an additional-- because I'm hasted, I can go 120 feet. I'm going to go up another 40 feet. No. I'm going to stay where I am. Stay where I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I heroic now? What does that mean? What do I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every round, because my charisma bonus is not that high, you get two hit points every round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I add two hit points to myself?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get them back. Yeah. Do they go up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get two hit points back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Temporary hit points. Yeah. They go up. Does he get them now, or does it start next round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me go look up your spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wording is unclear on my card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of each of its turns. At the start of your turn, you get--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two. Just two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm immune to fright. (cackles) Like always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up. You're currently inside Scanlan's mansion. Last thing you saw was Scanlan reach out and go "Fucking jenga!" and then disappear back into the doorway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I see when I look out the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look out the door. You see the two chained celestial-blooded boys standing there looking confused and frightened. You see Scanlan holding their chains from behind currently glancing up as Vax has darted off, winged, and has begun throwing daggers from the air 50 feet up and behind where the pit fiend is. That's what you see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take some shots from inside the mansion at the pit fiend, and then I'm going to duck away from the door again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Best place to be right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (mumbling) Sorry guys, this is taking a minute. Okay, well, you heal nine points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, your hair's still on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit, dammit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, the bonus, is the Spiritual Weapon still out there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. It's floating up in the air, about 15 feet up, in this alleyway here. You don't really know where any targets are at the moment, but you can still move it 20 feet if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I move it 20 feet closer to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know where either of them are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That'll be my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Vex, you're up. You're still inside the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come out of the mansion. I want to fly out of the mansion on my broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you fly out of the mansion on your broom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where you going, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! I fly up in the air and see-- My goal was just to come out, spin around, and attack, but I don't see anything. So I want to be about there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of this that you're pretty close to Scanlan. So as you swoop up to the side, you can see just barely aspects of the two of them, hiding behind edges of rooftops and towers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I don't want to actually be that close to Scanlan, though, for the actual--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As she floats away, I try to grab her butt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to shoot a couple of arrows at the pit fiend. Is he under cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he has three-quarters cover, so he has plus five to his armor class.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I be any closer so I wouldn't have that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get high enough to even see him, that's going to be your full movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why not do your full movement? It doesn't take away from your actions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's what he said. It's my full movement just to see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, for another full movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you rolled a nat one? First arrow arcs off in the distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the least amount of d20s that she's ever had in that tray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have four ones that are, right now, in jail. Second attack is a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits, yeah. Even with the three-quarters cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, cool, tight, awesome! 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 20 points of damage. Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking pretty rough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can barely see him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then, for Trinket's action, can he run up after Grog on the roof? Can he try to scramble up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's full movement, he can get there and start trying to climb. Go ahead and roll an athletics check for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He rolled really low. What is that, just strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, for him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he rolled five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is leaving these giant claw marks on the outside of the building. Not quite getting there. Starting to break the side of the stand that's next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, I've got to get some more 20s out here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, at this point, too, a number of the individuals on the street that are watching, as you're starting to move around, people are starting to back away and leave the space. These two guys disappear and start heading out of the street to get away from everything. These guys all begin to move this direction to get away from it all, pulling their various chained servants with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone staying and watching? Eating popcorn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, for the most part, once they realized the scope of what's going on, they were like, "We "should get out of the way." Ending Vex's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, do I have any view on Big Pharma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have no visual on either of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Is he peeking off, like if I shifted around, would I be able to see a little?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try. You saw him disappear behind the roof, but you don't see him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and shift toward you, to see if I can see him around the lava bend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around this way? Okay, you get your full movement there. Currently no view of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Can I take my action to go ahead and cast Sunbeam and then hold it until I see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you would do is, you would begin casting the spell and hold your action of casting Sunbeam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and what's the trigger for it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whenever I see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Visual? Okay, good to know. That's the end of Keyleth's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can I move to the tippy-top of the roof and, frustrated with my inability to follow this winged piece of shit, can I take the Titanstone Knuckles and slam them together, and enlarge myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you can! With what sounds like a mild sound of cracking thunder, these two sides of his gauntlets slam, causing Grog's size to swell to astronomical proportions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just a wee jump to that tower now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I was hoping for, but we'll see. But I have to ask. So that ornamental thing that's above the doorway of the tower, does it look like something I might be able to make a leap, with my Boots of Feral Leaping, and start a very rudimentary climbing up the side of the tower, King Kong-style, if I wanted to try and get up to where she is? Or would I be better suited jumping down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the limitations on the boots?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says 15 feet straight up, or 20 feet horizontally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, and there's no limitation to the number of times it can be used?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bonus action, that's it. If I fail the DC, I fall prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Cool. So you could attempt to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Well, go big or go home. I'm going to try and jump towards the tower and grab onto that ornamental fixture that's just above the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you jump and leap, I need you to make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you could make it to the top edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let him do his parkour, people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well yeah, in essence, I would like to jump towards the tower. If it goes better than I thought, then awesome. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you leap across the way and catch onto the side of the building there. Your fingers sink into the stone, your Titanstone Gauntlets. So that's your bonus action. You're now holding on to the side of the building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I use my movement to Crossfit my way up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you climb over the side, you do manage to get right over (impacts) right there. You see the erinyes is ducked down with the longbow drawn, with an arrow. Looks up and sees your much larger, now, face, grinning over the side, as you grin back and then (impact) land on the opposite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panting) Hold on, I need a breather. Naw, I'm just fucking about. You're dead. Can I go into a frenzied-- no, that was my bonus action, so I get two. Can I do reckless, Great Weapon Master, two attacks on She-Ra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The axe slides off and slams into the stonework next to her as she begins to step away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa. Do I know if she can do that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I already said it was, should I do it again because I said it? All right, fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She probably can't do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 31. Minus five, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, she didn't do it again! Yahtzee. One point of necrotic, 26, plus ten is 36.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36, oof. All righty. That end your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm a little attracted to the fact that she parried my first one. I'm kind of confused. Plus, you know, we're up high in the air, and the city's on fire. It's very romantic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it, that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends your turn. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use a bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of your turn, as you're on the edge of the roof, you see the being's right there, looming, just out of your arm's reach. I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's see how I do. Pretty good! 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? The sheer presence of this entity shakes you to the core. You are considered frightened right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I can't go toward him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot go toward him. While he's in the line of sight to you, your attacks and ability checks have disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On him, or everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As long as he's within your line of sight, you have disadvantage on all of your attacks and ability checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's 4d4 plus four, right? (adding) 16. Okay, I'll figure that out in a second. Then I want to use my first action to-- He's right up on me? I'll use my first action to disengage, and then I'm going to arc, almost go in a straight line, but arc slightly around the tower. Since Grog is right on the erinyes, I want to throw Whisper again at her as I zing by, 20 feet away from her. Yeah? Throw Whisper at her as I go by, and land as far away from the pit demon, because I'm so scared, as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far away as I can get, and I can go 120 feet with movement. Hasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can go ahead and do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Against her? But that cancels out, because I have advantage because Grog's right on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get advantage on the attacks for hitting someone. You just can sneak attack them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right, yes. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage on the attack. Oh, balls. One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Streaks off and returns to your side. You're landing over here, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as I can get, 120 feet. If there's a nook to scoot behind in the corner, I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably scoot behind that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that her name? It's definitely Gamora.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should ask her her name, you know. I'm going to be right on her in a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she has a nametag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, that ends Vax's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's not much I can do, so I'm going to run towards that next set of buildings and recover next to the fountain. That you can't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which way? This way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, the other way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to run over this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, I'm going to burn the whole thing and then, see that fountain right there? Full movement. Okay, not that far, the other side of the fountain. I'm hiding in that corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good. That ends your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That actually-- did that burn my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get there, that'd have to be a dash. It's a move and dash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, how far could I have gone without burning my action? I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have gotten onto the bridge there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay true to yourself, Taliesin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Touch yourself, Taliesin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay true to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's fair. I'm just trying to get somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Beginning of this turn. The pit fiend, Ghurrix, is going to then, its claws dug into the side of the roof, (roars) dart upward, wings out, in an upward arc toward Scanlan and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I said I wasn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm moving this away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let the man fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, Scanlan is there, and you're back that way because you went straight up out of the entranceway. Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Takes up, you go ahead and get the Sunbeam, and you do, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine's first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as soon as it appears up in the side there, you're doing Otiluke's Resilient Sphere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Handcone up, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere. That is a large creature. Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can my sunbeam go through the sphere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it cannot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I please sunbeam first? God dammit, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. That is a 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was the lower of those two rolls? Because I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lower, that was 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he makes it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, your Sunbeam does still--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's probably going to save from that too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just try it, man. Just try it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you watch him appear in the air, you finish the spell and release the beam, arcing past like a laser across the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (lazer zapping) It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw? That is 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he saves it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, wait! (mumbling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's a plus two to spell attack rolls. I can't use my--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It still hits, he just takes half damage and isn't blinded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's radiant damage, and he's not blinded. Which would have been so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll your damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he take extra because it's radiant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Leaps over and flies up right between the two of you, who are hovering up like this bright beacon in the sky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except I'm falling, because that was a concentration spell. Bigby's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is actually going to help you, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! So you go ahead and-- Did you make your concentration save against that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My concentration save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Otiluke's was, correct, yeah. So you're falling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He takes nine points of damage, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine points! Yeah, Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus, we're all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take, Scanlan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get any kind of athletic move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. 14 points of bludgeoning damage and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I in the lava?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are about to stumble into it. The heat is so extreme at that point that you-- So, you take 14 points of bludgeoning damage, plus an additional ten points of fire damage due to proximity to heat, as the lava's right at the heel of your boots right now. All right. So, as it lands next to you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's going to be better for him, though, than getting these hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to unleash a full series of attacks against you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Instead of shared, great. Yay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye! I'll take lava, bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 28.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the claw attack. So, you suffer--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You better use Cutting Words on him, for one of these things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aaah, the lava, I can't concentrate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of slashing damage for the first one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a troll tonight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bite attack is 25. This here, you take 15 points of piercing damage-- Sorry, 15 plus eight. So 23 points of piercing damage, total. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight. Cool, that is a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you are now poisoned as the fangs poison your body. You feel it pulsing through yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you suffer--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to get my calculator out to find out if I'm about to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of poison damage from failing the save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matthew? Would I have the wherewithal to see what's going on and try to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see white, right now, as you slam onto your back and (groaning) the ringing in your ears as this is happening. The tail attack is a 29 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that misses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, that one doesn't hit, but the rest of them do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is some bad rolls, actually. 16 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the mace. 25 to hit on the mace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, cool, tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you suffer 18 points of bludgeoning damage, so mark that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought that's what I just did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you took another 18 from the mace hitting you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got four attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is the last attack. So, 18 plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? That was already the 18? Or was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, some of the attacks, they add more poison to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jesus. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you took the 18 bludgeoning damage, plus an additional 15 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool, I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, all of a sudden you watch as the mace slams Vex in the side. Her form goes limp, arcing through the air. The broom spinning off and scattering across--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's attached to me. It is attached.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, it's spinning and scattering behind you as you arc over at the impact, that way--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right by me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to roll a scatter die on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scatter die! What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a three. You arc this way, so you fall and land onto the stonework, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right next to Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got your wish! Her body just landed at your feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean that's an automatic death save failure, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the fall and impact, yeah. So you automatically suffer one failed death saving throw, from the impact. Pike, you watch as Vex, crack! onto the stonework there, one of her legs hanging off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, off of the stonework, not off of my body. I was like, just like that, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Might've been worse if it had.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Left 4 Dead physics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, kinda. Just, crack! So that's going to end the pit fiend's turn. The erinyes is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a Dickens novel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to attempt to move away from you. She does not want to be close to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no, I am really a nice guy, when you get to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Go ahead and take your attack of opportunity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, great. I'm going to give this a 29 minus five, is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're having a fight! Oh, oh sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five points of necrotic, (adding) 38. Oh, oh, oh! Enlarged. 39.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you're prone on the ground, so you're going to be harder for her to hit. Three shots at Keyleth. That is a 28 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does inspiration help negate? All three hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit, okay. So you suffer, let's see. Each one of these is poisoned. I need you to make a constitution saving throw, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three, technically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't forget, Scanlan, you've been getting five extra hit points at the start of your turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan does not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's just the hit point max, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but Scanlan also lost that because he cast it on the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that's right, I've got that, at the top of my turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, but she did something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Pike cast Aid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would actually have probably lost concentration on that when you took all the damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I roll for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot to do that, because I'm not used to you casting. Roll four constitution saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ha, I'm sure I lost it. How do I do this? First one's a natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just three more natural 20s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the zero? Cool. 19. 15. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Third one, heh, is a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you are poisoned. So you take, on all three hits, the first one is going to be 17 points of damage. That was crazy, I rolled four sevens. 28 for the second hit. 18 for the third hit. So there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not fine, but she's not down.

Yep, okay, sure. Wait, who's dead? Okay, I'll Healing Word the dead person, the Vex. I will sing to her, (singing) Don't you give up, no, no, no! I won't give up, no, no, no! Let me heal you! Let me heal you!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I hide behind Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't get that far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jump in the lava?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're trying to kill the pit fiend, right? That's not going to do shit to a pit fiend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you try the sphere again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pit fiend would be 45 feet up, right? So I cannot, because I can only get 30 feet. I could hop and do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he looking rough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not even close. But

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But she's further away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will hold my action until the pit fiend comes in range.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a great idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) If at first you don't succeed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give up and run away.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. Scanlan's holding his turn. Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, am I even near Keyleth at all, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about roughly 50 feet from her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, if I go in the middle, can I do a Mass Cure Wounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Mass Cure Wounds? Range of 60 feet. Oh, in a 30 foot radius. So you'd have to move, you can get about there, move around Scanlan, and you can get Scanlan, Vex, and Keyleth, if you wanted to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fantastic. Big money, big money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, winner winner.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's 4d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus my spellcasting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's the plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's the plus five. Okay, so 4d8. Shit, that's not a lot. Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That d8's very exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I affected by this? I'm going to get health?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to get healed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I hit myself by falling out of the sky.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 31 hit points healed to Scanlan, Keyleth, and Vex.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Aid one? Yeah, you still have that, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She gave me five. Okay, great.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It'll be about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just wave it around, like, woo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We'll say it's a little ways back. He needs to move a little bit closer. All right, that ends your turn? Okay, at this point in time, as you're paying attention, Percy, as you're around the corner, looking up and seeing the fiend right there, you glance over to the right at the top of the round as you watch one of the Illuminated begin making its way that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's that close, already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It starts coasting up the side. It's coasting through, seeing all these things going off, spells and shit. You see it cruising through the air, a little bit high up, and is just arriving on the scene here, taking in the visual perspective here. As soon as it turns around the corner, it looks at you, looks at everything happening, and its hand goes for its weapon, looking at all of you surrounding it. Currently, it appears to recognize the individual up above, and you all not being from here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I look really cool with a fire beard and stuff, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. It sees a bunch of Vexes and Vaxes, essentially. A bunch of slaves rising up against a pit fiend, is what it's seeing. So, top of the round, Vex. You are prone, but conscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's half your movement there. You're still poisoned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, yeah, so you are no longer poisoned. That is your action.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mid-battle bribery!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Persuasion, persuasion. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You toss the gems, they scatter across the ground in front of this efreeti, holding its weapon to the side. He just snarls. All right, that ends your turn? Unless you want to move from your current position. You have half your movement now, so you can move 15 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move-- Is it stupid to move into the mansion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move into the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you move into the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends Vex's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Sunbeam him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so saving throw. That would be 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to turn into an air elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, how much damage does it deal? It still takes half damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Just a game of attrition, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, guys, this is a fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (adding) 33 divided in half, so, shit. 11! No, 12! 33? 16!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really nervous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're no longer poisoned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Real fast, just to make sure, I keep forgetting. The Sunbeam you had, and you took a bunch of hits from the erinyes? The damage you took from the erinyes. I need you to roll three constitution saving throws. I need to remember to do this. It's a lot to remember, guys. My apologies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a result of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage that she took from the arrows, earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 18 for the first one. Ooh, not good. Not good at all. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so in theory the Sunbeam would already have gone away before--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use inspiration on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus 12? Another seven! So 14!

lines.text: 14? That's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then last one, last one. 13.

lines.text: Okay, I'll say, I don't think any attack did more than 26 to you-- It's my own fault for forgetting. It's fine. So you maintain your Sunbeam. We're good. All righty, so. You turn into an air elemental. Do you want to move or stay where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez!

lines.text: It didn't hurt that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are currently Terminator-ing it into the lava right now. So that ends your turn? Vax, you're up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second attack is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to pull her longsword out and parry to the side. The second attack does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She adds a plus four to her AC.

lines.text: Plus four? I'm going to use, nah. Okay. Then the third attack is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so first and third. The first one gets the sneak attack. So that is (adding) 29, plus the psychic damage, gets 32. That's the one that sneak attacks. Then the other one, the regular one, where'd my pyramid go? Gets a ten. So a total of 42 between the two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oof, nice. So, as you dart up around and land to the side, as you jam the blade into her side, she gasps out and you can feel the strange, burning warmth of her blood on your hand. She's not doing too well. All right, that ends your turn? All right, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shoot to kill, baby. Do it, golden snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy, okay. Oh, this is so bad. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In your visual range right now, you have the pit fiend up in the air, you have the efreeti that just arrived, that is currently assessing the situation and is not favorable in your path right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He passes, again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a phenomenally interesting disaster. No, okay, I've got some plans. I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to construct a small lever system.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try and get him to drop his, ah, fuck. Yeah, fuck it, I'm going to get him to drop his mace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good move. That mace sucks all the balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm taking that shot with sharpshooter. Actually, no, you know what? No, just straight, clean. Yeah, that'll do. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Strength save to try and--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a strength save against, I believe, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I don't even know why I bothered. But at the very least, that is ten regular points of damage, two psychic damage, and six necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to, yeah, I'm going to hold off on that for a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seeing if I can fake out the djinn to thinking that maybe things are a little complicated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get advantage on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. Okay, that'll do. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you come charging through the doorway, you guys watch as Percy's form disappears into the space, which is immediately followed by a heavy slamming sound as the pit fiend, like a Keyteor, drops right there, on the ground, right next to Pike and Scanlan. It shouts over its shoulder, "Call your men!" as it emanates from its psychic wave of telekinetic speech, "Call your "men! I need aid." Going to unload on the beacon of divinity that stands before it, that has healed--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless it is trapped in my sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as it moves into the space, what's the save on that again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 if I'm using my cone, which was up for my last one. I did not Cutting Words on this one, so he's got advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 22. Plus eight to his dex saving throw there. He has resistance. He slams onto the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to wave at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wave at him, Pike, he makes his claw attack against you. That is a 19 plus, that's a 34 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that hit, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! It doesn't hit! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 40 points of piercing damage, Ashley, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matthew Mercer, keeping us humble since 2013.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really enjoying himself. TPK tonight, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, boy, that's bad. I got an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a gift.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pronounced "jift."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's going to swing with its tail action. That is a 20 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to Cutting Words that, with my reaction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My armor class is 20. Unless, there were no aids with that--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hold on. You're going to Cutting Words?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a hit? So I'm going to Cutting Words that. I'm going to sing, (singing) Your evilness is killing me, and I must confess, I want to flee! But when you see me you lose your mind, baby it's a sign! Pit fiend, baby, now you're mine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was strong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll that d12, man! You earned that shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then continues the swing, but that's just enough for Pike to dodge out of the way, as it cracks into the stonework. However, it then backswings with its mace toward you with its final attack, Pike. That is a 22 to hit. So you suffer 15 points of bludgeoning damage, plus--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm unconscious, I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious? Well, that would have been an additional 24 points of fire damage. So Pike is poisoned and unconscious. Scanlan, you feel the blade at your side begin to vibrate at the end of your song. The Mythcarver that's been sitting there, it begins to shake and quiver at your side. The erinyes is against you now, it's its turn. Throws the bow to the side, on the ground. Pulls its longsword out and is going to go three attacks against you, having jammed your blade into its side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one is going to be a 19?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 13. Last hit is a 24.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use a second luck to make her roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is even better. That is a 25.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is five plus four, it's nine points of slashing damage. Actually, sorry, that would be plus more-- Nine points of slashing damage, plus you take 20 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the poison's full, but the swipe is halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's all in one strike, so the whole attack would be halved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it was nine plus what? 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right, Scanlan, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck. I'm going to draw Mythcarver and look at it. Admire it for a moment. Turn to Pike, who's right next to me, and Healing Words her with just a simple touch. Can I demonstrate on you, Taliesin? I'm going to do this. Just that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was actually rather pleasant, I have to admit it. You have very soft hands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've never worked a day in their life. Ten points of healing to Pikey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you sing, Pike, you do not heal anything. Pike remains unconscious, bleeding. The healing does not make its way through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's poisoned!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god, sorry, that was so wasteful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But anyway, what are you doing? You don't notice this. You sing to her, finish your verse, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that changes things! Fuck, I stick to the plan. Hand Cone up. I'm going to try and Dominate what's-his-butt. The pit fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Dominate Monster?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw. So that would be 23. 13 plus ten, he would've had disadvantage but he has advantage against spell saves, so it comes to a single roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it, nothing's working.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has advantage against spells! Magic casters have been useless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike is dead--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I can't leave her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you move her, you'll get an attack of opportunity on her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The thing is, I've made a promise to stay alive. So I'm going to run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, which way are you going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Toward the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you move toward the mansion, you go through to the lighted doorway. It gets an attack of opportunity on you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make its bite attack. That is a 21 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You suffer 20 points of piercing damage. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, that Heroes' Feast, man. That would've been clutch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would have been so great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You just succeed in shrugging the poison off, as it bites out at you and the teeth claw against your shoulder as you run past, scooting around the way to where the entrance to the mansion is. You're still feeling the blade vibrating at your side. It's almost like a pulse, like it's trying to fight to be free. So you rush around. You get to this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. That ends your turn, Scanlan? Pike, I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.text: Okay, well, let's see. 1d8 plus one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just roll a d20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what to do. I don't think I've done this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten or higher.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's a failure. You also take a pulse of the poison damage in your body, so you fail another death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fix right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to heal her!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's close to her? Do you still have any spells left? The poison spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I have the poison spell--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're in the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm first out. So, yeah, but I can run out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you drag her in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can't move her! He'll get an attack of opportunity on Pike!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he's already burned his attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, trying to get Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The efreeti, now, watching you now attack and go after this fiend, pulls its blade out and rushes toward you, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guess those jewels didn't do shit.

lines.text: You can keep the jewels, though. Stanky jewels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's heading toward you. "Halt! In the name of the Sultan!" Takes its blade out, and it's going to make two scimitar attacks against you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do this and say, you wouldn't hit a guy with glasses, would you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes they would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to stay back there, on top of the bridge, and he's going to hurl two balls of flame at you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why, why!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a ten to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the second one misses you and blasts in the ground next to you, but the first one does--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something missed! It's so nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 13 points of fire damage to you, Scanlan, as the fireball blasts against your chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matches my beard, now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it just made you look real cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that brings us to the top. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'll immediately see Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Pike, unconscious, on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, she's right under the demon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't, it's dangerous!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You will die!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As far as I know, its reaction, its single reaction--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- it's not going to work. I'm going to try to distract him with Trinket, so I'm going to have Trinket attack him as I run in and cast Protection from Poison on Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you rush forward to cast your spell, I will say, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because yeah, fuck. I was in the mansion. What's going on? Can I say that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've probably, I imagine, been narrating an awful lot of what's going on through the headpiece. Well, maybe not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those don't reach into the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can just see that Pike's unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see that Pike's unconscious. What'd you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a, oh, just intelligence? Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you have no idea that she's poisoned. You just see her unconscious on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can't even cast that on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you wouldn't know to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, she was yelling-- Well, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She wouldn't have heard you, she was in the mansion. Downside of using it as a defense mechanism.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up next, Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Lesser Restoration heal at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't heal, but it should fix poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If she knew there was poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know that she's poisoned. All right, then I'm going to waste my turn completely and try to cast Cure Wounds on her, because that's all I fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush forward, Trinket distracting, are you using your bonus action to have Trinket attack? So go ahead and roll the attack with Trinket. You rush forward and put your hands onto Pike, desperately trying to heal her. As the energy pulses through her body, no effect. All you see is the wound from the bite of the fiend in her neck, and you see the dark veins curling up. Now you know, at that proximity, that it's poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I couldn't have run up and looked at her, to know it was poison? To see the black around her fucking--? Cool. 27 for the attack on Trinket, and then that is a 14, no, that's a lie. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I move, I'll get attacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to Sunbeam She-Ra right in the face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Announce yourself, woman! Thing! Whatever!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just say, I'm sorry, what's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this perspective, you will hit him with your Sunbeam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I can fly, so can I scooch around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move around this direction, try and do it there. So burst that way. Just wanted to make sure you're aware of-- All right. Rolled two threes in a row. Does not save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (adding) 29. No, no! 27 plus four is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you dart around the side of the erinyes, you see her bloodied--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush around, your hands glow. This beam of sun energy bursts out. You hear the screaming echo as her body is turned to ash within her armor, causing the armor to clank to the ground, the rope at her side scattering to the ground as well. She has been destroyed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something. It's a hollow victory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, good job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have any more movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You've moved five feet, so you still have--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 85 flying speed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got Pike. I want to, can I make it to Big Pharma? I don't remember any of their names. I'm just using the nicknames we've come up with. Ghurrix.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get up next to him, if you want to. You want to get up next to him? There?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I flank him a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could fly over and flank him this way, if you wanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to flank.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to flank.

lines.text: Kind of hard to flank without stepping into the mansion, unfortunately, because the door is right there on the flank.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fly, though. I can hover. Can I hover and flank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really. You have to be on the entire opposite side from somebody else. So there's no real place you can flank here, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all good. You're going to die anyway. It doesn't matter, right? We're all going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll puff up real big.

lines.text: Good to know. So you are puffing up real big. We'll say above. All right, cool. Grog.

lines.text: Right, not that I don't love being in this river of liquid magma, could I get out, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first you take 74 points of fire damage from being in the lava at the start of your turn.

lines.text: Can I use Stone's Endurance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26. So what's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'd be 48. You take 48 points of fire damage.

lines.text: Thank you for doing the math for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pain is unbearable, but you use that to fuel your anger as you climb out, feeling the molten rock spilling off of your body. I imagine you're going to want to move out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Toward everybody else, where all the danger is. The fun zone. Now, I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to flank around this way, or this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, attack of opportunity is against the creature that's running, so it'd probably be against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I would like to pick up my buddy Pike and make like hell for the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Oh, Pike!

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loot Crate, Loot Crate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to rocket into the door, so I've got haste, I've got 120 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to arc into the door. If I pass the pit demon, I'm going to use disengage as a bonus action so he does not, and I'll swivel underneath.

lines.text: He's already used his attack of opportunity.

lines.text: He has? Oh, and Vex is right next to him? Five feet? I'm going to stab him in the fucking face as I fly in the door. 24, hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is (adding) 41, as I fly past into the door. Use Lay on Hands twice. There's nothing in the book that says I can only use it once a turn. So I'm going to use the first time I use it to cast Neutralize Poison on her, and the second time I'm going to use it to give her one hit point. It doesn't say anything in the book about amount per turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As an action, you touch a creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I have two more actions.

lines.text: You used one to attack.

lines.text: Can I use the bonus action to attack?
