lines.text: You could use your haste attack to hit him on the way through, and that can only be used as an attack anyway, because that's the nature of the haste bonus. You can use your action to neutralize the poison.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, question for Matt, and I'm Liam right now. If I bring her up ten hit points, right, poison doesn't bring her down anymore in 5e, it just puts her to disadvantage, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This poison, you're not quite sure. You don't know the circumstance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use five points of Lay on Hands to cure the poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is as much as you can do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if I can only use Lay on Hands once, I'm going to throw another dagger out the door into the pit fiend--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot see him from that side of the door. The doorway is facing outward. He's on the other side of the doorway. That is the end of your turn. Pike is no longer poisoned. The bulging black veins retract from her throat. The shallow breath is still there, though fading. Percy.

lines.text: Are you inside?

lines.text: I am inside.

lines.text: I got lots of potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab a potion from-- I was about to say, I know I have one, but everything got fucked. We restocked right before we went. I'm going to feed her a potion for my move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, for your bonus. Well no, it would be your action to feed her a potion. All right, so, feeding her just a basic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feeding her a basic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That is a 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Do I still have movement? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is now at five hit points and conscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pikey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good teamwork, good teamwork!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (voice cracking) Don't do that to us, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, that end your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Weird question, how far away is Vex from the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet will get you inside, and get her just outside the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike? I thought she was already inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was me he was doing that to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you unconscious, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, she's in striking distance of the asshole. I'm getting her out of striking distance of the asshole. Okay! That's my move.

lines.text: Takes a leap up (whooshing, crashing) in between Scanlan and Vex. Let's see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at his eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's real angry at both of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've tried twice to put him in a magic sphere--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three times! But I've done nothing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As an intelligent creature that is very, very familiar with high-level mind controlling--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All I've done is perform for him, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. Regardless, he's going to take a claw and a bite attack at you, Vex, and then make a mace and tail against you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, wait till we get to it. So the claw against you is 34, with a 19 on that. You take 18 points of slashing damage from the claw. The bite attack--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's unconscious already!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're about to be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 25 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you suffer (adding) 21 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck, I'm unconscious again. By one point!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the poison? I've got resistance to poison now, because I cast Protection from Poison on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're unconscious. The spell goes away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, that's bullshit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even though she was conscious when she got bitten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The poison damage isn't what knocked her unconscious. The bite hits, she falls unconscious, and the poison goes through her body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an eight because it's a saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you fail a death saving throw as the poison courses through your body. You are now poisoned and unconscious, right outside the mansion door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, for you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tail attack is a 20 to hit you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least we all see that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you just watched that happen right in front of the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we now know what to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm holding my dying friend, next to my dying sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the tail spins and slams you to the side, you get pushed against the wall in the corner where you've been hiding. The mace is going to swing toward you. That is going to be a 25.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, well, I'm Cutting Words-ing it, but it's not going to do much unless I roll a lot. I'm going to Cutting Words him with a lovely limerick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fuck. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was a young fellow named Brewster, who said to his wife as he goosed her, "It used to be "grand, but just look at my hand. You ain't wiping as clean as you used to." (sounds of dismay)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you give him, Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The only thing I could think of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What horror have you brought upon us?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even an ambassador to the Nine Hells is taken aback by the sheer filthiness of this limerick. Go ahead and roll your d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's bad. It's two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mace hits you from the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just for the sheer limerick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 11 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Starting to drop like flies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus 16 points of fire damage. Still standing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. All right. That's going to end the pit fiend's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about your sword?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the sword! Yes, attack him as you run by him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still draw Mythcarver, and then I put it away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, come on, attack him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't hit things with swords.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it's vibrating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I did something with everything that vibrated on my body, I would be doing stuff all day long, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you pull the blade from the scabbard?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did in the last turn. It's still out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the second time, as you pull the blade out, you can see it's glowing, and it's like a tuning fork. It's vibrating at the tip, and the sword is wanting to guide you. It's your call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like this is a very strong hint from the Dungeon Master.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not picking up any signs from him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you should just put it away. Maybe offer him the Mythcarver to leave us alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do, Scanlan? Your choice entirely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to bonus action heal myself, Healing Word level two. Okay, two of these. So that's nine points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get nine points, all right. You heal nine points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, and then I'm going to let the sword guide me. I'm going to position it around my belt and thrust forward at the beast. I don't know what to do now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll a d20 to start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you used your Cutting Words feature, so your attack's at advantage, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you let the sword guide you, you feel this energy, this warmth come from the blade, fill your arms, and for a second you watch and feel the spirit of a hundred bards that have wielded this blade course through you. You see many, many foes that have fallen to its blade and those that have fallen clutching it at their side. And utilizing that, you unleash a flurry. You actually get to attack four times, all with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've had this by your side the whole time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever it is, Matt's been sitting on it for months. Months.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First one is 24. I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's real good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The second one is more than that. I'm not even going to do the math. Third one's even more than that. I'm not going to do the math. The fourth one is-- Well this is cocked, so I'm going to redo that one. It was a ten plus nine, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That last one misses, but the first three hit. Go ahead and roll damage on those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mythcarver is a 1d8 and a 1d6 plus three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So we're up to 16. Not very much. Ooh, that's good. 29 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the pit fiend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you fucking kidding me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get to kill the pit fiend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the only person that saw it was fucking Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this doesn't feel fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He only had 22 hit points left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I slice, I want to slice one wing off, then the other wing off, and then, as I stab him straight through the heart, I will say: no one messes up a deal with Francois Australia!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cannot believe it. I

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And all of us have been fucking running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but the Vestige got used!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As one wing is cloven off from one side, in a clean cut, it turns into ash and fire on one side. The other wing darts off, hits the lava, and turns to ash across the top of that. This time, as it's snarling toward you, the voice in your head saying, "I will find you!" the blade (stabbing) right through its chest. (gasping) Its jaw hangs open as you say that. Its eyes go dark, and the body burns into ash and dissipates.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drop to my knees, start crying, and say, I'm so amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I never knew!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have the power! The power of Greyskull! All right, so I'll-- shit. That's it! Oh shit, so, there's a guy. There's a guard, right? Oh, shit. I can't do anything to him. So I'll just yell at him, he was an assassin, sent to kill the Sultan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on! Come on, bard!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 34. That's 18 plus 16, whatever that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's taken pause, though. Meanwhile, I need you to make another death saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I run out to her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're unconscious. Oh, Percy helped her! That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're okay for now. However, you still take poison damage from the poison pulsing through your system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's an automatic fail. So thank god I passed, because I would have just died!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to finish dragging her in, so that we can fix this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we out of combat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So no, I'm so sorry. I'm going out of turn, then. I'll wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the efreeti that is standing there and has halted his assault. He's assessing the situation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're out of combat, I'll do Lay on Hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not out of combat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's the end of Vex's turn. Keyleth, what are you doing? You're currently up where it was, in your elemental form, with multiple efreeti making their way down the road this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got something! But I've got to wait my turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we try to get in the mansion, or what do we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, mansion. Mansion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Safe bet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I, as part of my speed-- I wasn't that high up, I was just hovering above-- can I go down, scoop up Scanlan, and both of us bolt into the mansion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why Scanlan? Why not me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every time you try to pick me up, I say no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex is right on the outside of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's unconscious, and poisoned, and bleeding out--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right on the outside of the door. Okay, I'm going to swoop down and drag her in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex will remember this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have an action, yes. You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop my elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you are now back to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I cast Protection from Poison on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the poison is no longer pulsing in your veins, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god I took that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, that being the case, Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I poke my head out the mansion and see who's still outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see about five of them rounding the corner towards the Arches.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look around. Is Scanlan still outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is still outside. Scanlan's off in the corner. You see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pardon me, Master Australia. The slaves need hosing down. And I retreat inside the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right away, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13! Plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The efreet standing there went from unsure if truth to, "They're fucking lying." Eyes glare back at you, Scanlan. Vax. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scuttle over to my sister, then, and scoop her head up. I'm looking out the door, watching what's happening with Grog, give her a gentle noogie and cast Lay on Hands, last five hit points to bring her health to awake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're now conscious, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that sucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my turn to wait for the efreet to encounter Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll also say that I'll hold an attack if an efreet pokes its face in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have more efreet heading down this pathway here. Scanlan, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Handcone up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I got skipped!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're after Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's one person left before you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, so Scanlan goes again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! I did accidentally miss your turn last time in the mansion. What do you want to do, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I peek outside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in the mansion now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're in the mansion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's awake, but very low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got like one hit point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got five hit points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to check what I have left here, which is, let's see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually, let's say it's one. Not five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gave her one. Just one. You can do that; you can mete it out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do Cure Wounds at fifth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 5th-level Cure Wounds onto you, Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just an EMT; she's the doctor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Yeah, I got something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I'm holding my turn! If you can make this go away, I will be very happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is looking very bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the entire city guard now coming at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jeebus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a book full of shit limericks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much does that heal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking much better than you did a second ago. That ends your turn, Pike, or are you going to do anything else?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stay here in the mansion because I'm useless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're now about to be flanked by a series of efreet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to cast Modify Memory at sixth level.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten minutes have not gone by! This whole thing's taken two minutes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This whole thing's been, roughly, from beginning to end, about two minutes, yeah. From a spatial positioning standpoint. Okay! It has to make a wisdom saving throw. Because technically you are fighting the creature because Grog made it hostile again, it does get advantage on the saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Watching this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it may be just an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why I'm going to check, yo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In-game and out of game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm glad you're using it on enemy rolls now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing in that book that says he can't! There's something in

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll make you really happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can also spend a luck point when an attack roll is made against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just attack rolls, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been really powerful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Abuses of the Clergy"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my favorite chapter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. That is 19. What is your spell DC, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch its eyes glaze over for a minute, and the flame flickers out in its hand as it drops to the side. What are you doing? What are you modifying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are strong. You should tell everyone this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you paint out this whole memory, this whole image of watching this pit fiend, caught by you guys and this Illuminated efreet, that this plot was uncovered. The scuffle continued and you make this entire epic battle, where somehow you're the most powerful creature in the universe and tore this thing asunder, practically one-handed, next to this efreet. You instill it with the joy and the pride that it just foiled a plot against the Sultan. You watch as its limp self puffs up with its hands on its hips. As the spell finishes taking effect, rewriting its memory, it looks down at you and goes, "You are brave, small one!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not as brave as you, sir!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your assistance will be remembered." He puts his hand out to clasp yours. It encompasses your entire elbow with a Beastmaster shake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Noodle arm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're blowing-- Stop blowing smoke. Well done." The efreet that you cast on looks a little deflated. "No, but seriously!" Points to the ashes there on the ground and goes to join the rest of them. They're giving him shit. You can tell there's a rapport with them. They don't fully believe his story, but there doesn't appear to be any intent against you. Through a brief conversation with them, they have no reason to consider you an enemy. You've, through a single series of lucky rolls and a perfect use of Modify Memory, prevented the probably 10,000-ish Illuminated that were in the city. Let me look at the specific--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to double check, I still have my attack, though? So I can actually hit him and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a great idea! Do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More than that! You're looking at 50,000 Illuminated that are in the City Guard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to saunter over to the pile of ash and see if there's any proof that I can grab that we took care of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would join him so I can grab the mallet, the mace that the pit fiend had. Unless it turned to ash as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did not turn to ashes. However, when you grab it, it is a dull, cold iron mace that is too large for you to use.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too large for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you could use it, but it would be disadvantage on attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he can carry it, right? Proof. You've got to trade it for the Dawnmartyr armor. Is there anything else left of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the rest of it's just ash. The rest of it burned away into ash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't he have a symbol on his chest, or whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the symbol that he had, yeah. You would find that, which is his mark of his station within the embassy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was he wearing a leather thong kind of thing, with a flap? Because I feel like I could really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at the mini-- Nope. Did you check for anything else, while you're here? As apparently the rest of the crowd has begun to come back and fill in the Arches again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's am-scray.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the rope she had? The lasso?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go look to see if there's anything left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll fly up there and see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let's all take a short rest and then go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there is her armor scattered across the top of the wall. The bow is broken. There is the longsword, and you do see the rope still there, as well as a pair of nice boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll grab it all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice boots. You have so many fucking boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you grab the sword, you grab the boots, and you grab the lasso.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one wears shoes in this world? Only boots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a minute. We have a little more story resolution to go through before I finish the episode tonight, so hold off just a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a three hour fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Scanlan, you can go ahead and get your-- This is Mythcarver in its awoken form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, before I go in the mansion, I gather up those gems that I threw at the efreet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have the announcement of who wins this at the end of the break. Okay, after break, we'll come back with the winner of that. So pay attention to the chat room, enter. We'll give away, to one lucky winner, this awesome Wyrmwood dice box. Thank you guys. We'll see you back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo, we didn't die! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Returning to the circumstance. You, Vox Machina: bruised, beaten, and through some clutch timing-- and thank god some of you guys got initiative at the top of that round. Maybe we'll talk more about this on Talks on Tuesday, because there's some shit that could have gone really wrong if you guys didn't get initiative or if you hadn't grappled him at the beginning. Yeah, it would've been bad. Anyway, while you guys are taking a short rest-- so you can go ahead and use as many of your hit dice to heal up, if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We probably should've done that on the break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can sing a song to heal you all by 1d12. Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On top of whatever you used your hit dice on, you also heal 1d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will sing a song. I will sing: (singing) Heal thee! With a song, heal thee, all night, all night, all night long. Heal thee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 1d12, and then we do whatever after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 1d12 plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he rolls it, so Sam, go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 12!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone heals 12 hit points, and then let me know how much you heal based on your hit dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fully healed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy's fully healed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and short rest, which means I get all that back, and I get that back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hit dice, huh? Okay, lots of math going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anyone looking at the items you found?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, I'll look at my stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Boots or rope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I healed up to 168.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 168 on Grog. All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm up to full. 99.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is full.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up to 85.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 85 on Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am up to 80.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up to 100.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, so boots or rope, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rope, and I'm going to pass the boots to Keyleth to look at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to pass these over to you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Here you go. I passed this to you so you could look at them. This is the Rope of Entanglement. The rope is 30 feet long and weighs three pounds. If you hold one end of the rope and use an action to speak its command word, the other end darts forward to entangle a creature you see within 20 feet of you. The target must succeed a DC of 15 dexterity, or become restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you read that slow all the time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. You can release a creature by a bonus action. Target restrained by the rope can use an action-- I'm trying to scan it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you essentially release the rope as an action toward a creature within 20 feet, and it tries to wrap it and restrain it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'd essentially be grappled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Restrained. Grapple just means their movement is brought to zero. Restrained means their movement is brought to zero, attack rolls against them have advantage, and attack rolls that they make have disadvantage. And they have disadvantage on dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do ranged attacks also have advantage? Oh! So you grab something and we start whaling on it from a distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the rope, yeah, you can do that. You're your own moving gallows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can be destroyed. It has 20 hit points and an AC of 20. Is it limited by the size of the creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't restrain a fire giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not going to work on Thordak, just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These boots appear to actually be boots that my people might have made. They are Boots of Spider Climbing. The wearer can spend an action to cast Spider Climb on themselves, no concentration required. The effect lasts for an hour. Spider Climb lets you-- I go to Percy. He's waving dibs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, no, this is definitely for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody want this rope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want the Rope of Entanglement?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I healed to 74, B-T-W.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I say what I healed to? I did, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yeah. So as you guys finish a short rest, you've taken in the circumstance. You've narrowly avoided a very,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought that the guards were going to show up way sooner. We lucked out. They've got a low response time in this city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [static]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do? You're inside the mansion. You still have the two slaves you acquired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, we should talk to them. They're not in chains, though. Did the servants get the chains off of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The servants did take the chains off of them. They're both hiding in the back of the foyer as you guys are resting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go on, Vex. See what they want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I wander over to them. Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. What's your name, darling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both seem a little more relaxed than when you first spoke with them. "I'm Kyor. He's Hunin."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kyor and Hunin? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you need."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been captured?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe a year?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! And where did they take you from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were taken from our mother, on the poorer side of Therines."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Therines? Where is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's in Wildemount."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay! We know where that is. Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're from Wildemount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She sold us off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because we're special.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're different, too!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us are rather different. I hate that music when I'm talking. It makes me creeped out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, I'll stop playing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you going to do to me, you creepy little boys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've changed the music. For you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did we get their names yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Kyor and Hunin. Well, would you feel safe going back to them, or would you like to be with us for a while? To your mother, I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have no real care or love for her, for what "she's done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever the fates bring us toward, I suppose. We'll walk that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they've brought you toward us, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He still seems uncomfortable and very much like, "what are you going to do?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not slavers. We don't want you as slaves. If you'd like to stay with us, we can try to keep you safe. At least, we can get you out of this Fire Plane, if all things go well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over to Hunin. Hunin looks and shakes his head. "This place is terrible. If you know a "way out, please, take us with you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you feel about snow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like snow. Where we're from, there's lots of snow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that will do, then!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a very nice city where we came from. Might be able to start a new life there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How old are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're both about..." You can see they have to think for a second. You get the sense that they probably didn't have a very good education, either, where they came from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Respect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About 15?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I might be that many.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you can come with us for a while, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Did you eat some chicken? Have some chicken. Put some meat on your little bones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other spectral servants come and take their hands, lift up, and lead them toward the kitchen where they both excitedly seem to enjoy the prospect of fresh food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat quickly, though, because we'll probably be leaving soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could leave them here while we go do our business.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't need to check back in with Senokir. He already has a way to get hold of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we could just go straight to-- Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you guys are fine with it, I think we can check back in to repay our debt to Senokir another time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get our armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we can stealth there, get the armor, and then get out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second, though. Grog, that magic bucket you have, does it make champagne?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it make ale?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pour it out. I walk over to Scanlan, I grab him by the face and cheeks. Look at this guy! I scoop him up and I put him on my shoulders. I walk over to Keyleth and I say: Look at these fucking two! To Scanlan and Keyleth, the two biggest fucking heroes I know! Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, I'll drink to that! I take the jug and I stick my face in. I go: Beer! It makes four gallons of beer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank all of us. We did this together!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did do this together, and we didn't do anything that you wouldn't have done for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to drink all of the beer if you don't stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grog! Share.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sloshes a bit. There's enough for half a cup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For everybody, or for one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For one half cup?! Is that all it does?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It makes four gallons. I'm a big guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a teeny sip. Pike, would you like any ale?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a wine cellar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You there, blue fellow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a fellow! Not a fellow. A lady.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass it down. All right. So should we take the boys with us, then? Because we're not necessarily coming back here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have just enough room in my spell bus to take us all back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then I bamf Trinket back in the-- well, I can bamf him back in when we-- I'm going to leave him out for a while. Let him stretch it out. He's been confined for a bit. You did so good in that fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises) Rubs against you. He seems pretty proud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did better than your mom. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to the corner. I've still got Scanlan on my shoulders. I'm going to invert my hands and grab him and turn him upside down. Hey, you know I'm teasing, but you're an amazing man. You are a hero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That means a lot, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shut him up and I kiss him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, upside-down Spider-man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just take it! Take the compliment, you fucker!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! That's not the first upside-down elf man kiss I've ever had, but it's probably top three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go to Scanlan's cheek. (patting, slap)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't take that much damage!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay, do one for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (grunts weakly)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go find my sister. I'll talk to you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been a great Bigby's Hand moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've gathered your two companions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should probably slave ourselves up again. We don't have to go far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have the illusions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you kissed Keyleth in the middle of that fight!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is weird!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You totally kissed your sister.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nasty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then right now planted one on a flaming, dark-skinned, bearded fellow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like I'm learning so much about you, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name is pronounced

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys gather your things, you make your way back out into the Thoroughfare of the Arches, where you can see there is now a heavier patrolling guard of Illuminated in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We put our chains back on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up to Percy before we put our horrible chains back on, and I grab his hand, and I give him a peck on the cheek and whisper: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome. And yes, that was weird for me, too. Just weird right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a peck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, thank you, but it's weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After my bit with Scanlan, I put the ring back on and spend the next 20 minutes attuning to it, and she hears behind her: (mocking) Oh, thank you. I love you so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go (grunts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get an elbow right to the stomach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's got to roll for it with disadvantage because I'm invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's grown up with you. She knows exactly where you are going to whisper into her ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mocking) Your hair is so white and beautiful. I'm so in love.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mocking) You're a shithead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door has the same knob on the front. You knock. The door is lifted and the two fire giant slaves greet you and lead you into the home. There across the way on the other side of her large desk, still waiting, arms crossed, fingers intertwined, you see grinning the ever opulently dressed Juuraiel. Waiting for you all to approach quietly, with a smile on her face. Her eyebrows tensed and furrowed, expecting either a sweet victory or word of a sweet defeat. Either way, she wins.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the necklace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out the necklace and throw it at her feet. Or on the table in front of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks at it. "So it is done, then?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If word has not reached you by now, honestly, I'm quite surprised.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not. We were super stealthy as requested.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Word of mouth. It's a small city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Died in disgrace, as well. Plot to overthrow the sultan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A disembodied voice says: Totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My servants will collect your necklaces. Thank "you. Thank you very much."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for the plate mail, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. My apologizes. It's been a long day." She reaches up and takes the armor pieces there and sets it on the edge of the desk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just curious, what do you say we play one hand?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you've done enough gambling for today.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just for funsies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, the deal is done. Get out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goodbye. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you care if we do a little teleportation spell in your living room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would recommend doing it towards the foyer door."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, because you've got-- thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Do you want to put it on now, Pike?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chanting) Put it on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came all this way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys help her get out of her armor. The fire giant's awkwardly watching from a distance as she's down to her skivvies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold up a towel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she doesn't have to get fully naked in here. She's not naked under the armor. There's padding and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's Pike. She's hardcore. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be painful as shit. Pinches everywhere. But the plate, which is about human size, it's too large for Pike, and it gets loose when you get inside of it. It's hanging off of her. Once you get the last piece of the armor on, she looks like a child wearing her parents' clothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then, with a creaking sound, all armor snaps to her form, and you watch as the beautiful brass scrolling across the armor itself begins to brighten. You can see bits where the scrolling glows with this pulsing, almost internal fire, and the rubies gleam. And you see the air around her begin to distort, like the air distortion over a hot flame.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! Oh jeez!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to read it to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you got rubies all over you and stuff!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, completionists, we fucking did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Legendary weapons!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw, I can't really read it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura will read it in Ashley's voice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Travis. Read it in Ashley's voice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Oh, beautiful brass scrolling and priceless--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, that's a little-- (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beautiful brass scrolling and priceless cut rubies adorn this silver set of amor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't read the whole thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's up to Ashley if she wants to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to text it to Ashley to read?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's getting it right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, text it to Ashley. This is the speed of internet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley can read it out loud, if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Faster than a speeding Loot Crate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not to be greedy, milady, but what's the story with that ruby shield? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start walking up wearing the armor you just won and ask her this question?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like it matches. That's my only reason I'm asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of her hands reach up over the desk, because you can barely see her from your vantage point, you're so small by comparison. Both of her hands reach over, grasp the edge, and she leans forward, looming over you, her large grinning dark skin, vibrant red hair, braided, adorned with jewels and metallic bands of platinum. She leans down. "It is not for you to worry about. Now, "leave me to my collection. You've already taken one from me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look awesome, Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look amazing, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it actually hotter in that armor? Are you sweaty in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually very comfortable and quite cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you read what it says, Ashley?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it quieter than her other mail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's still loud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still pretty loud.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I read it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please, read it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Beautiful brass scrolling and priceless cut rubies adorn this silver set of armor. Worn by the high priest Duana of Pelor as she fell in the battle of Ghor Dranas. While wearing this armor, you gain a plus-three bonus to AC?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's not the best part.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? It gets better!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You cannot be frightened, and you gain resistance to fire damage, and when you are struck by a melee attack, the attacker suffers 2d6 points of fire damage!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It gets better!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you are knocked unconscious by an attack or spell, a blast of healing flame surrounds you. You immediately regain five hit points and are lifted to your feet! All harmful creatures within 15 feet of you must make a dexterity saving throw or take 6d6 fire damage, half damage on a success, and once you've used this ability you cannot use it again until the next dawn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! So if someone kills her, they hurt more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She bounces back from death one time a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From unconsciousness, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unconsciousness one time a day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they hit her, they take damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she goes unconscious, they get blasted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nuts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the heck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a good Vestige.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guys, we got all the Vestiges!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got all of our legendary weapons.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: That we know of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happens if we all put them together? Do we become Voltron?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go home and do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's try to stack ourselves into some sort of weird pyramid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are we going home or are we going--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Fort Daxio?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we go home first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Daxio.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to check in with creepy guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can come back for him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? We don't need to check in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gave him a bracelet. He knows where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want him coming for us. Don't we owe him something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we can't take care of it right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gave him the bracelet so he knows where to find us. As soon as we kill Thordak, we'll come back and make good on our word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if we survive, we'll send him a Jelly of the Month club membership.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This does not seem like a good idea. If we are in mid-Thordak battle and he shows up to collect, we're fucked!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'd button it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if we go back, though, what if he wants to cash in right now? I gave him the bracelet. Deliberately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think that meant we're going to leave the Fire Plane before we settle the favor that he

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, we didn't have the time to come here, period, so let's go talk to him and ask him if we can have a few days to get back to him. If we die, problem solved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'd make us owe him another fucking favor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I also recommend that we leave the children out of that room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, remember, we're dragging children everywhere we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you send those children back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mansion is still up, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but we'd have to walk all the fuck back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, he mentioned, "Let me give you a trinket in case you all leave so I can find you again."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he's expecting it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but then we put it in his court when he shows up. Favors.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it a bad idea to just be like: We're all done. We just got to go do a thing. You know where we are. We'll be right back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just afraid he'll try and cash in on it right now and not let us leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we'll settle this. We don't want Garth from Wayne's World to have anything on our heads.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, we're mostly nice people, but I'm pretty sure Grog could crush him like an accordion. We're not going to do that, but we can set the terms of the favor a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Then let's fucking go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go get Senokir.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far of a walk is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, with you guys not having a guide and trying to go off memory in coasting through, it'll take you a little over an hour, but you do find it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The establishment you now see from the other side. There are three different types of languages written above the top. One of them is Common; it says "Flame Garden," and that is the name of his jeweler's business. As you guys come to the front doors, which are actually open for business, there are no customers in there at the moment, and you see Uten in the back is currently working on some sort of a crafting circumstance, has a heavy jeweler's visor-type setup with a number of magnifying circular glasses set up, and is currently grinding something small against a piece. You see Senokir is off in the corner, currently going through papers, and as you guys step inside, he glances over. "So. Hello. It's good to see you so soon. Can I help you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're about to head home, and we want to make sure that you know that we have not forgotten that we're indebted to you and that we plan, quite possibly if it's amenable, about contracting you for services in the future, as well, in your more common field.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That could very well be amenable. I am glad you returned, for if you are on your way, this "would be a good a time for me to ask for your favor." He turns around and goes behind an area and moves a couple of things around. You seem to hear the clicking of something unlocking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want some autographs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No need. But you're sweet" And he pulls out a small, dark box. It's about this big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's in the box? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here. I want you to take this and do me a favor. This will consider our debt cleared, yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This box contains the ashes of my late wife Zaafin. I've kept them for years and had been "intending to make a trip to Vasselheim and bury it beneath the Birthheart in the Abundant Terrace "where she once lived, toiled as a girl. I would hope that you do this, and I will consider our "pact complete."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it? What a nice, sweet man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we misjudged him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It would be an honor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Sure, go ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like it's going to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to see. No, not a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your night, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is not my night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Sure." Better be a 40 or higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. He's hard to read. By his nature, everything is even-keeled and strange. You can't keep rolling insight until somebody gets a ridiculous number!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this the size of the ashes, the box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, it's about eight inches by eight inches, and about maybe four inches high.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, I just got a four insight check, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. You're all very confused. "Well, I appreciate both meeting you all."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where exactly would you like us to put these?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Birthheart. Bury it where the nature's roots touches the soil. She'd like that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do hate to pry, but how long ago did your wife pass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This would have been four years, two months, six days--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why is it important to bury it there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's where she grew up as a girl."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have our condolences.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a promise. It will be done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Family and history are important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let us be off, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you ever find yourself in the Material Plane and need a tour guide--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Senokir, do you have any fire potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on, I'm conversing. What were you saying?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just, you know where to find us. I gave you that bracelet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, indeed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll most likely be hearing from us, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. He does quite good work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need a commission?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have a thing. I'm giving it some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time? It was just yesterday or two days ago at the most that you said you needed it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on a commission. It's going to be lovely. It's going to be a surprise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not anymore. You're saying it in front of all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, fine. If we survive this, we're going to have killed five dragons, so what a lovely thing it would be to have something built from the scales of five dragons. We would be the only people on the plane to be adorned with the scales of five dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking about fingerless gloves made of dragonscale?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that's exactly-- and Ray-Bans.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not what I was expecting, but I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if we survive this, I think we all should be given something beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some emblem?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, perhaps adorn the castle with a few of them, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, this is a good place to start. This is above average here. It's a whole other dimension.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love his work. We'll be in touch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have your card. We're good. Yeah, we know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, I'll be here."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, what was your wife's name? Do you want us to put a marker there or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Zaafin."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zaafin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As one last thank you to him, since I'm still invisible, I make moose antlers behind my sister's head and go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (quiet laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I wanted. One last laugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you so much. Stay safe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around and goes back to his paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, Senokir, before you do that, is it safe for us to teleport out of here? You won't mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just going through his papers, not paying attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, where are you guys going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fort Daxio? Yeah. We all join hands with the kids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, the kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I bamf Trinket back in my necklace so that we have enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's one big fatty spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and eight. So let's go! (teleporting sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fort Daxio is in the process of falling. And that's where we're going to go ahead and pick up next Thursday.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Consequences.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And cows.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Consequences and cows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, maybe we shouldn't have gone back to Senokir.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long were we gone? Do you have any rough estimate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long was I gone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long was I out for, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the full rest you took to prepare for your encounter with the pit fiend and the travelling to and from, probably close to two days. Anyway, we'll pick that up next week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two weeks from now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, two weeks. Yeah, that's right. Two weeks from now, because Thanksgiving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congrats on getting all your known Vestiges, guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's all be thankful for Vestiges and thankful for being alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have all the Vestiges!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we're not dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Daxio really needed a restart anyway. We can plan our attack from somewhere else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many people did we gather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent out and notified a number of individuals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's only been a day and a half, so nobody has got here yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope so. I hope we didn't put all of our eggs in one basket and then burn the omelet. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True Vox Machina.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to do great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for coming!

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's here on Twitch and Alpha. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Playlist on Friday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, playlist on Friday, tomorrow, from Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the next playlist still going to go up the day after Thanksgiving, or is that going to be two weeks from now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, one's going up tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should go ahead and do it. Give them something to tide them over.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Let's give them something to talk about!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and those winners, those are going out this weekend to the winners, just so you guys know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the costume winners, you'll be getting your stuff soon. Thank you guys so much. Much love, and is it Thursday after next Thursday yet? Happy Thanksgiving, guys! [music]
